title: Plate, ""American Cities A.D. Scenery. City Hall New York"", mid-19th century
markings: "C.M." printed on underside as well as "Improved Stoneware China" impressed.
dimensions: 3.25 h. x 25.5 diameter cm (1 1/4 x 10 1/16 in. )
description: Brown decoration over white. There is a floral border around rim. Central design shows figures in a park overlooking City Hall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, ""American Cities A.D. Scenery. City Hall New York"", mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Earthenware, transfer-printed decoration. Gift of Paul F. Walter. 2001-25-10.
